content.rendered:
John Wood left behind a shattered civilization that was plagued by an epidemic in the past, but his fate may soon catch up with him.

Directed By Fansu Njie

Writers: Fansu Njie. Daniel Stisen. Andreas Vasshaug

Stars: Daniel Stisen. Olga Kent. Daniel Nehme
